mapper.select:
select si.corp_id corpId , si.corp_name corpName ,si.agency_num agencyNum ,si.fixed_phone fixedPhone, si.sys_type sysType ,si.location_province locationProvince,si.location_city locationCity, si.location_area locationArea , si.location_address locationAddress, si.register_province registerProvince, si.register_city registerCity, si.register_area registerArea, si.register_address registerAddress,si.email email ,si.uniform_credit_code uniformCreditCode, si.legal_person legalPerson ,si.cellphone cellphone ,si.id_number idNumber, si.business_license_path businessLicensePath, si.corp_consitution_doc corpConsitutionDoc, si.note note , si.business_scope businessScope from supplier_info si
si.status =1 and si.sys_type = 4
and si.agency_num LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{agencyCode}),'%')
and si.corp_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{agencyName},'%'))
and si.corp_id =#{corpId}

select a.id id, a.corp_id corpId, a.project_name projectName, a.project_describe projectDescribe, a.project_contract projectContract, a.project_invoice projectInvoice, a.project_qua projectQua, a.project_accept projectAccept, a.system_time systemTime, b.corp_name corpName, b.agency_num agencyNum
from supplier_project_info a LEFT JOIN supplier_info b on a.corp_id=b.corp_id WHERE 1=1
and a.corp_id = #{corpId}
and b.agency_num LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{agencyNum}),'%')
and b.corp_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{corpName}),'%')
